channel.title: Need Good Advice!
channel.description:
I would like to know what are the best servers for pking it can be any type of server 317 - 562 :P
It should have like most specials and weapons used for pking also all mage and prayer and every combat skill should work pretty good :P ( that can be downloaded and edited :P)
just post the server name in your post
Thankyou
